topic.title: Setting Up a Floating License Server for

section.title: Determine if you need to set up a license server
section.p:
If you are using floating licenses for , you may need to set up a license server. If the computers that will be using the floating licenses are on multiple network segments, you must use an floating license server. A floating license server can be installed as a Java servlet. A floating license server can be installed as one of the following:
A Java servlet. This is the recommended method.
A standalone process. version 17 or higher requires a license server version 17 or higher. License servers version 17 or higher can be used with any version of a floating license key.

section.title: Activating Floating License Keys
section.p: To help you comply with the EULA (terms of licensing), all floating licenses require activation. This means that the license key will be locked to a particular license server deployment and no multiple uses of the same license key are possible.
During the activation process, a code that uniquely identifies your license server deployment is sent to the servers, which in turn will sign the license key.
